Courses.title: Data Science with Python for Intermediate
Courses.description: This course covers data analysis, visualization, machine learning basics, pandas, NumPy, and real projects using Python. Ideal for future data scientists.

Courses.title: JavaScript Essentials for Beginner
Courses.description: JavaScript fundamentals including syntax, variables, loops, functions, and DOM manipulation. Perfect for beginners to starter web programming.

Courses.title: HTML
Courses.description: Learn HTML from scratch: build real web pages, understand semantic tags, forms, images, layout techniques and modern HTML5 features.

Courses.title: CSS
Courses.description: Master CSS: style web pages with Flexbox, Grid, responsive design and animations to make your websites look professional.

Courses.title: The Complete JavaScript
Courses.description: Deep dive into JavaScript: understand variables, functions, DOM, APIs and build interactive website features from scratch.

Courses.title: Python for Everybody
Courses.description: Learn Python basics and advanced concepts: from variables and loops to file handling and simple web apps, ideal for beginners.

Courses.title: The Complete Web Developer
Courses.description: Learn full web development: combine HTML, CSS, JavaScript and backend tools to build complete modern websites from start to finish.

Courses.title: Java Programming
Courses.description: Understand Java programming: syntax, OOP fundamentals, and how to write real Java applications from basics to advanced topics.

Courses.title: Learn PHP for Beginners
Courses.description: Start building dynamic server-side web apps using PHP, working with forms, sessions, databases and real backend logic.

Courses.title: The Complete Python Developer
Courses.description: Advance your Python skills with real projects, backend development, APIs and more to become a professional Python developer.

Courses.title: Full-stack Web with node.js
Courses.description: Build scalable full-stack applications using Node.js, Express and JavaScript: from server setup to databases and APIs.

Courses.title: Advanced CSS and Sass
Courses.description: Master advanced CSS and Sass: scalable styles, components, responsive themes and modern layouts for production-ready sites.

Courses.title: Cisco CCNA
Courses.description: Learn Cisco CCNA networking fundamentals: routing, switching, subnetting, protocols and real networking scenarios.

Courses.title: Networking Fundamentals
Courses.description: Understand core networking principles: OSI model, TCP/IP, addressing, and hands-on fundamentals for building network knowledge.

Courses.title: Practical Ethical Hacking
Courses.description: Learn practical ethical hacking: reconnaissance, vulnerabilities, penetration testing and cybersecurity defense strategies.

Courses.title: CompTIA Network+
Courses.description: Prepare for CompTIA Network+ certification with deep understanding of networking concepts and real exam scenarios.

Courses.title: Cisco CCNP Enterprise
Courses.description: Advance in Cisco networking: enterprise-level routing, switching, automation and high-scale network design.

Courses.title: Packet Analysis, Ethical Hacking
Courses.description: Learn packet analysis and ethical hacking methods to secure networks and understand low-level traffic behavior.

Courses.title: Adobe Photoshop CC for Beginner
Courses.description: Learn Adobe Photoshop CC: create stunning graphics, retouch images, work with layers and masks, and design professional visuals. Perfect for beginners starting in graphic design.

Courses.title: UI/UX Design Bootcamp for Intermediate
Courses.description: Master UI/UX design: learn user-centered design, wireframing, prototyping, and tools like Figma and Adobe XD. Ideal for aspiring UX designers.

Courses.title: Graphic Design Masterclass for Advanced
Courses.description: A complete graphic design course covering typography, color theory, layouts, and creative workflows. Great for intermediate to advanced learners looking to enhance their design skills.

Courses.title: Web Design for Beginners for Beginner
Courses.description: Learn the basics of web design: HTML structure, CSS styling, responsive layouts, and user-friendly design principles. Perfect for absolute beginners.

Courses.title: Adobe Illustrator CC for Intermediate
Courses.description: This course teaches core Illustrator skills: vector shapes, pen tool, typography, logo design, and scalable graphics. Great for intermediate designers.

Courses.title: Motion Design & Animation for Advanced
Courses.description: Learn motion graphics and animation principles using After Effects, keyframing, effects, and project workflows to create professional motion designs.

Courses.title: Design Essentials Adobe XD for Beginner
Courses.description: Learn Adobe XD to design and prototype interactive user interfaces. Covers design principles, wireframing, and clickable prototypes for apps and websites.

Courses.title: Canva Master Course for Intermediate
Courses.description: Master Canva for creating graphics, social media posts, presentations, and marketing materials with simple tools and professional results.

Courses.title: Mastering Photoshop for Advanced
Courses.description: Advanced Photoshop techniques including masking, color correction, compositing, and digital art creation. Perfect for designers who want to go beyond basics.
